thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 18 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Federal judge says jurisdiction lacking in Cynosure lawsuit

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Federal judge says jurisdiction lacking in Cynosure lawsuit
text:
A federal judge in Chicago has dismissed most of the plaintiffs in a false advertising class action brought by dermatology clinics against tattoo removal company Cynosure Inc, finding their claims were barred by a recent Supreme Court decision narrowing courtsâ€™ ability to hear out-of-state claims.
Judge Frederick Kapala of the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of Illinois on Tuesday rejected the arguments of the mostly nonresident plaintiffs that he could exercise jurisdiction in their case.
To read the full story on Westlaw Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2rmA1cY
